/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The clear blue sky overhead adds to the vibrant atmosphere of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid and bright, reflecting the lively spirit of Beijing.
